text: I can't believe the waiting time is so damn long. Waited 1 hour plus my queue number still not called yet!!!!!!! Only 2 or 3 counters open. I know you all want to cut down counter n expect people go online but doesn't mean we need too wait that dam long!!!! Worse than seeing doctor!!!! Where is the customer services and the waiting time!!!!

The waiting time here is horrendous and thereâ€™s hardly officers ready to serve you. Despite showing as one of spacious banks the execution of customer service and waiting time is terrible. Will not recommend anyone to be at this particular outlet of OCBC

Such a big branch in Jurong Point but waiting time horrendous

Time check 1432hrs still have not call up my number 1hr20min of waiting
Mother F!!
Only few counter open for saving and current acount!!

Close my account!!!
Byee ocbc

The waiting time was really horrendous. This branch opens at 11am. I reached here and got a queue number at 11:04am. To my astonishment, there were already 20 customers in front of my queue number. Moreover the branch has limited seating spaces and there are only 3 customer service counters. While I'm writing this review, I looked at my watch and the time tells me it's 12:15pm. More than an hour and it's still nowhere near my queue number. As a long time OCBC customer, I can't help being immensely disappointed.

Who want to go ocbc jurong point better dont go..the counter only open 2 counter only...the worse in singapore... waiting time almost 2 hours...if u just outside/major can settle no need go to counter.but if the office standing said that u need to go to the counter.better go other place...knn
